org.ccnx.ccn.io.CCNAbstractInputStream.ContentHandler

org.ccnx.ccn.io.CCNAbstractInputStream.ContentHandler Class Reference

Creates a separate thread to do content handling. More...

List of all members.

Protected Member Functions

void process (CCNContentInterest ci)

Detailed Description

Creates a separate thread to do content handling.

We need this because we can't do verification on the netmanager thread because we may need to retrieve a key which requires the netmanager thread to complete.
